title: Basler Studien zur Deutschen Sprache und Literatur
additional-notes: This is a Swiss publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
